summary: Your financial health looks quite good! You received multiple income deposits and kept your spending under control, resulting in a noticeable increase in savings this month.
insights: Total income for the month (£5474) was significantly higher than total spending (£1395.17).
Multiple direct deposits indicate a steady and predictable income stream.
Spending at petrol stations occurred twice, suggesting regular travel.
Monthly recurring expenses like rent (£987.33) and insurance (£45) are being managed consistently.
tips: Consider minimizing petrol station visits to reduce fuel expenses further.
Allocate a portion of your biweekly income to a dedicated savings account to maintain growth.
Review recurring expenses like phone bills and insurance to identify potential savings opportunities.
